title: May 9th violence: Arrests climb over 2,700
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police says that arrest of suspects involved with the violent activities on 9th May are done daily.
Accordingly, Police have arrested 21 suspects within the last 24 hours, with 2,725 suspects arrested in total so far.
Moreover, the Police Spokesperson said that a total of 857 suspects have been granted bail and 1,083 have been remanded.

Commission appointed to probe recent violence to call for information
